IncidentDef.label: USAC mech supplier arrival
IncidentDef.letterText:
A USAC mech supplier ship has entered orbit. They are willing to trade mechs and weapons for corpse bags, mech wrecks, components, and hemogen packs.
Use the comms console to contact them.

IncidentDef.label: USAC mining raid
IncidentDef.letterText:
USAC has detected valuable deep resources on your map. They are deploying a mining rig with mech escorts to extract them.
Destroy the mining rig or eliminate the escorts to stop the operation.
